title: NizamIQ UDS Frontmatter Schema
description: Schema for validating the YAML frontmatter of all NizamIQ documentation.

id.description: A unique, kebab-case identifier for the document.

title.description: The human-readable title of the document.

description.description: A one-sentence summary of the document's purpose.

tags.description: A list of relevant keywords for search and discovery.

status.description: The current state of the document.

last_audited.description: The date of the last time the document was verified against its source.

authoritative_source.description: The path to the code or system this document describes. Use 'NA' for non-specific docs.

version.description: The semantic version of the document (MAJOR.MINOR.PATCH).
